comment: It will be denied. Weve already got many many reports of very serious short time side effects and they are at best being cast as either inaccurate and unreliable from official sources or at worst, labelled disinformation. Wont change. Will only get worse.
amr:
# ::snt It will be denied. Weve already got many many reports of very serious short time side effects and they are at best being cast as either inaccurate and unreliable from official sources or at worst, labelled disinformation. Wont change. Will only get worse.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (d / deny-01
            :ARG1 (ii / it))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (g / get-01
                  :ARG0 (w / we)
                  :ARG1 (r / report-01
                        :ARG1 (e / event
                              :mod (s / side)
                              :mod (t / time
                                    :ARG1-of (s2 / short-07))
                              :ARG1-of (s3 / serious-02
                                    :degree (v / very))
                              :mod s))
                  :quant (m2 / many))
            :time (a2 / already))
      :op2 (c / cast-02
            :ARG1 r
            :ARG2 (o / or
                  :op1 (a3 / accurate
                        :polarity -
                        :domain r)
                  :op2 (r2 / rely-01
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG1 r)
                  :source (s4 / source
                        :mod (o2 / official))
                  :op3 (l / label-01
                        :ARG1 r
                        :ARG2 (d2 / disinform-01)
                        :mod (a4 / at-worst)))
            :mod (a5 / at-best))
      :snt3 (c2 / change-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (t2 / thing))
      :snt4 (w2 / worsen-01
            :ARG1 t2
            :mod (o3 / only)))

comment: If you were paying attention the experts have said you can still get it & transmit it even after you get the jab; AND, you still have to wear a mask & social distance. Therefore it does not protect anyone.
